# Continuous Uniform

> Continuous uniform distribution.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var uniform = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dists/uniform' );
```

#### uniform

Continuous uniform distribution.

```javascript
var dist = uniform;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();
